alert.note: Alert for Butte; Fall River; Harding; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 6:05AM MDT until April 07 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Wyoming and northwestern, southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected this morning, mainly across northeast Wyoming and northwest South Dakota where up to an inch may accumulate. The combination of snowfall and areas of blowing snow may impact travel.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.
